instructions: Place the dinner plate on the lower portion of the table
place the dinner fork to the left of the plate, tines pointing up
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork in the same orientation
place the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the blade facing left, vertically
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife in the same orientation
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, bowl pointing up
place the water glass to the upper right of the dinner place above the dinner knife
place the wine glass to the right of the water glass
place another wine glass to the right of the previous wine glass
place a coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
place the bread plate above the dinner fork
place the butter knife on top of the bread plate
place the desert fork above the dinner plate, tines laying horizontally pointing right
place the dessert spoon perpendicular to the dessert fork, above it with the bowl pointing left
place the napkin in the middle of the dinner plate
